body: So the delinquent SLUT stay virgin? What a rare NTR. He should vote the red SLUT and fuck her silly

Yeah, definitely not Netorare. I feel like the author probably got shat on a lot for that title. Literally no relationship whatsoever. 
Anyway, kinda dumb one. Good art, but that's about it. Definitely not one of the better mind-break eromanga I've read.

Netorare: When your mom, sister, childhood friend, wife or dog sleeps with a bunch of people and it bothers you.
FIRST PAGE OF CH3 IS MISSING BETWEEN CH2 AND CH3

They were never dating, she never even knew he liked her. He decided to front her to the school as an easy slut, and paid the price by letting her out of his sight in the anime world. Let's be honest you morons, how can you even get triggered by this story. None of it would ever happen in real life because a: that poster wouldn't happen and b: she'd be suspended or expelled straight away.
Netorare is fucked up, and those who enjoy it lack empathy, are immoral, and should be exiled from civilized society.
if they are not a couple how the fuck this is ntr? yeah the guy loves her and he is sad, but that's all,

Lovely, though I just skimmed through the thumbnails and the long haired dude is just an unrequited crush of Satsuki(the girl with the skull hairclip) also @Iexpectedbetter if your don't like it then don't read it cause it is already said in the title that this is NTR.
